title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about floating in a dream in the sea is an indication that he wants to know some things and seeks to know the details related to them, but it is better if he does not know them, because they cause sadness. Seeing a person in a dream swimming in the sea with difficulty is evidence that he is facing some problems. In his life. Whoever sees in a dream that he is swimming in the sea but drowns, this indicates that he will witness. Interpretation of a dream about floating on Nabulsi. If a person dreams that he is swimming in the sea well and is able to swim a long distance, this indicates that he will get rid of some of the problems he is in. Seeing it Floating in the sea water and the water is still, this indicates a new job that he will find. Interpretation of a dream about swinging for a single woman If you dream that you are floating in the sea and the water is clear, this indicates that this is a sign of a suitable life partner who will come to propose marriage to her soon. Seeing yourself swimming In a lot of water in a dream indicates that she was satisfied with it, this indicates the knowledge and benefit that she will gain. Interpretation of a dream about floating for a married woman: Seeing a married woman floating in the sea. The water was clear of her husband’s devotion to her. Seeing a married woman floating in the sea indicates stability in marital life and happiness With the husband. To float easily in the sea is evidence of achieving goals and desires. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a pregnant woman. A dream that a pregnant woman swims in clear sea water indicates easy childbirth and the health of the fetus. Interpretation of a dream about a man swimmingIf a man sees in a dream that he is floating on his back, this indicates The sins he commits. As for floating in the sea and feeling afraid, it is evidence of anxiety about some problems and things that he is experiencing. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: A detailed interpretation of saffron in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of saffron in a dream in detail. Saffron is a beautiful aromatic plant that has multiple benefits and is used in many medicines, foods, and cosmetics. It also has an attractive and different smell, a distinctive taste, and a bright, shiny golden color. It is an essential and powerful medicine for the most dangerous diseases of the age, namely depression or disillusionment. And anxiety, which is an excellent alternative to painkillers that harm the body, but seeing saffron in a dream is a promising vision or is it a bad omen or evil? We will know in detail in our article today about the interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream according to many scholars. Interpretation of saffron in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Scientists unanimously agreed on Seeing saffron in a dream has many beautiful connotations that indicate kindness, abundance of money, abundance of sustenance, and kind and gentle words that rejoice hearts and refresh the mind. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is buying saffron, this is an indication that he will receive a lot of praise and compliments from his dreamer. Those who are close. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is cooking food and adding saffron to it, this indicates an illness that the dreamer will suffer from. As for the one who sees himself in a dream with saffron stains appearing on his clothes, this is a sign of breaking the covenant. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is taking saffron from A famous person in his dream, this indicates his marriage to a woman rich in money, beauty, and power. Interpretation of saffron in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi sees that the smell of saffron in a dream has a beautiful indication of sincere honesty, the pioneer’s good conduct and his undisputed reputation. Likewise, saffron in a dream of all kinds is a sign On the good and happy news that will delight the heart of the dreamer in the very near future. But if the dreamer obtains yolk from any place or person, this is evidence of the abundance of money, good news, and work that is sufficient for him and new as he desires, and God is the Most High. And saffron in a dream, as Al-Nabulsi sees it, can It is a sign that you are traveling to a country to earn money. As for whoever sees himself mixing saffron with henna, this is an indication of the good news and beautiful and good events that accompanied the fortuneteller in his life. Interpretation of saffron in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees saffron in her dream in general, this means that she It relieves suffering, alleviates suffering, and gets rid of all the problems and worries that were bothering her. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is cooking food and putting saffron, this indicates an illness that afflicts the dreamer, but he will recover from it soon, God willing. But if an unmarried woman sees yolk mixed with henna Whether she puts it on her hand or in her hair, this is an indication of the goodness that was said by the fortuneteller and good interpretation. But if a girl receives a yolk in her dream from a woman, this indicates her blessed marriage, and the offspring resulting from this marriage are valid by God’s command. Interpretation of saffron in a dream for a married woman: A crowned woman sees herself buying saffron from the market, then this is a sign that she will introduce new pleasure into her life. In the case of a married woman who sees saffron in general in her dream, this

title: Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing a cousin in a dream symbolizes comfort in life and understanding between relatives, and whoever sees his cousin looking at him and smiling in the dream, this means comfort in his affairs and an increase in his circumstances. Seeing his cousin talking to you in a dream indicates gaining wisdom and guidance, and a dream of shaking hands with a son and uncle indicates To solve the outstanding family problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing your cousin in a dream as reassuring and comfortable in life, and it could indicate relationships between family members. Whoever sees his cousin in good condition in a dream, it shows close relationships. In the family, seeing a cousin in bad condition in a dream shows fragility and weakness of relationships, fears. Seeing a sick cousin in a dream indicates a lack of communication and alienation between individuals, and a dream of meeting cousins ​​indicates that you are gaining strength and support. Going to visit a cousin in a dream means Solidarity between family members. If you dream that you enter your cousin’s house, this indicates obtaining your rights and entitlements. As for the dream of refusing to visit your cousin, this indicates dispersion and division in the family, and whoever sees that the cousin accepts it. A house in a dream, and this indicates that he will fulfill the rights and trust of relatives. Seeing him defending his cousin in a dream means support among family members, and whoever sees himself defending his cousin by talking in the dream, this indicates his good memory and beautiful praise among people, and seeing his son His uncle in defense in the dream shows him. Guidance and advice. Walking with a cousin in a dream indicates cooperation between individuals in the family, and whoever sees that he is traveling with his cousin in a dream, this indicates that his circumstances and conditions will change for the better, and God knows best. Seeing a cousin in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a cousin in A dream means honor and bond, and if you see your older cousin in a dream, this means that you will gain strength and support, and seeing your younger cousin in a dream shows kindness and nourishment, and sitting with your cousin in a dream means an increase in price, and whoever sees that he is standing with his cousin in a dream, this indicates... Support him in adversity. If you see that you are eating with your cousin in a dream, this means that you share sustenance and money, and seeing food for your cousin in a dream means acts of justice and charity. To dream that you are taking something from your cousin indicates that you bear responsibilities and burdens, and whoever sees That he gives something to his cousin in a dream, means that he will be offered help and assistance. The involvement of his cousin in the dream indicates the beginning and desire for new projects, and whoever sees his cousin’s groom in a dream, this indicates that he will reach a high position, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for a son My uncle looks at me and smiles. Seeing your cousin looking at you and smiling in a dream means facilitating things and removing obstacles. Whoever sees his cousin looking at him and smiling a lot in the dream, this indicates harmony and love between family members. Seeing his cousin looking into your eyes and smiling in a dream indicates his support for you. He dreams of being his cousin. When he sees him, this indicates that he follows your news. If R

title: The meaning of the name Futheina in a dream

preview.html: Buthaina is an Arabic feminine name, and it is the diminutive of the word “Buthaina.” The Bathna is soft, easy to ground, fine sand or fine cream. Ibn Manzur says: “A woman’s name should be small, meaning Buhayna, and therefore a beautiful woman is described by her.” As for her name, which means cat, it is not in good health, as some people were confused. They believe that the meaning of Buthaina in the language is the name of a beautiful cat, and this is, of course, wrong. As for the dream, it is the name of the good interpretation and is classified with abstract nouns. If the sleeper sees in his dream a girl of extraordinary beauty, whose name is Buthaina, then this is a coming world in which the dreamer will be as lucky as he saw the girl. . And Buthaina Mahmoud in a dream for men and women. The meaning of Futhaina in one dream The name Buthaina in a dream, which is an unmarried woman, is a good and good interpretation, especially if a girl or woman named Buthaina appears in the dream. It indicates smoothness and ease in every matter. Whether it is related to her academics, work or even her love life. In a praiseworthy dream, a woman with a beautiful face, good appearance, good will and a smiling personality is defined as not getting angry or angry. It is praiseworthy in the dream that the dreamer receives her and receives from her a gift of clothes, food, and the like. Reading: Seeing naked in a dream. It is not praiseworthy in the interpretation for a woman to appear in a dream as an unmarried woman, naked, barefoot, hungry, dirty, or angry. Likewise, callers disliked a vision in which a woman cries, cries bitterly, or sits on the steps of a grave. Meaning of Buthaina in a dream for a married woman: It is good to hear the name Buthaina in a married woman’s dream and to see it written as gospel. It is also good for a married woman to appear in a dream wearing a beautiful jacket or shirt, or to see her smiling softly. Read also: Nightgown in a dream It is good for a married woman to see a young girl called Buthaina in her dream, and the girl in this context can be a clear sign that no Wearable for a married woman. The dream can come true when the girl who appeared in the dream is her friend's daughter or her neighbor's daughter. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: A young girl in a dream is a joy or a wish that comes true. In addition, the name Vouthaina can indicate an enjoyable life and comfort, expanding nutrition and facilitating life in all its aspects. If the name Vouthaina in the dream coincides with positive signs or symbols in the dream, it can be considered a good omen. Provided that the girl in the dream fulfills all the conditions of a good vision, from appearance to behavior. Meaning of Buthaina in a pregnant woman’s dreamAll diminutive names, such as “Bethaina Al Warqa” and the like, often indicate in a pregnant woman’s dream that she will give birth to a girl. The name also has many good connotations, such as comfort or relaxation, and may indicate many good things to come. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a young girl called Vouthaina, she kisses her, rejoices, or sees her sitting on her lap. You may also be interested in: Seeing dogs in a dream Meaning:

title: Interpretation and interpretation of the dream of seeing one’s mother dying in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the death of a mother in a dream. There are many dreams that a person sees in his sleep that lead him to insomnia and anxiety and sometimes spread fear and terror in the souls of these people, because the dream can be frightening. It is frightening or brings some clues or frightening scenes, and one of these dreams is the dream of the mother’s death. This dream causes a person many worries and restlessness, because the father is the source and source of tenderness. As soon as a person feels that his mother is going to die, his mind stops thinking because he does not want to accept this idea at all, but this dream has special interpretations that some people interpret, and why this will be the subject of our discussion during this article about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother’s death in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Seeing the death of a mother in a dream: Dreaming of a mother dying in a dream has many connotations. The interpretation of this dream for a pregnant woman differs from its interpretation for a man or a young man, which means that these interpretations differ depending on the state of the fortuneteller, and this interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother in interprets a dream about a young man while he is alive as follows: If a young man sees in his dream the death of his mother and people carrying her around their necks, This indicates the status and high status of that young man. When a young man sees in his dream that his living mother has died, this indicates the approaching marriage of his marriage to God Almighty. If a young man sees in his dream that his mother has died and he is condoling with her, this means that he will soon get engaged and receive congratulations and blessings on her. If a young man sees in his dream that his mother has died and that he is crying for her while the tears are falling without screaming, this indicates the approaching relief. If a young man sees in his dream that he is carrying his mother on his neck, this indicates that he is giving his mother her rights, and that he is fair to her. When a young man sees In his dream that his mother is fighting and dying, this indicates some problems that will appear, but these problems will end soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a strange man, which I like by Ibn Sirin and its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a pregnant mother. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the dreams that carries many connotations, Where the interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother in a dream for a pregnant woman is interpreted in different ways, and these interpretations are as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her mother has died and she is consoling her, this means that her birth is near, and that she will emerge healthy and free from childbirth, O God, and she is blessed. And blessings for the newborn or newborn. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her mother has died, but in reality she is still alive, and that she sheds many tears and cries a lot, this is a sign of comfort and a healthy birth. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her mother has She died and that he covered her, it means facilitating her birth and completing her birth. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her living mother is dying and fighting in the dream, this is a sign that she will face many problems and obstacles in her next life. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her mother has died and that she is pregnant On her necks, this indicates her high position and position. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead woman in a married woman’s dream: seeing a dead woman in

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pen in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pen in a dream in different cases, and pens are of two types, a pencil and a ballpoint pen, and pens in a dream have their own interpretation for a man, a pregnant woman, and a girl who does not. The young man has never been married, and today we will learn in our encyclopedia article about the interpretation of the pen in all its types in a dream, good or bad. Interpretation and interpretation of the pen in a dream: The pen in a dream indicates the dreamer's vast knowledge and great knowledge, and that she is one of the people who end evil, and there is a strong relationship between her and God. Whoever dreams that he is writing something with a pen on a piece of paper, this indicates that the dreamer is safe and protected from division and distress. The pen in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be blessed by God Almighty, and he has a son who excels in his studies and becomes a teacher or a relevant writer, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a pen in his hand and another pen next to him, this indicates that he will have a son or that he and his brother will enter into a successful business from God. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a pen that is beautiful in appearance and that an angel of great status gives it to him, this is evidence that the owner of the vision will give him a lot of money, and he will enter his kingdom. I deal or work with a person of high status and he will succeed, God willing. The pen in the dream indicates that the dreamer will live without diseases, God knows best. Interpretation of the pen in a dream by the scholar (Ibn Sirin): Ibn Sirin said about the pen in a dream that it is evidence of the owner of authority and high status. The pen in a dream shows the newborn (boy), the sword that speaks truthfully and the conscience that does not accept injustice. The pen in a dream indicates that a person repented to his family, but God Almighty returns him in peace. Interpretation of (pencil) in a dream: The knowledge used for the pen indicates that the owner of the dream is a righteous person who is fair to his family and a good person in his job, God knows best. Interpretation of the scholar (Al-Nabulsi) of the pen in a dream: The scholar Al-Nabulsi said about the pen in a dream that the pen is one of the desirable things in a dream, indicating the kindness of the dreamer, his knowledge and his insight. The pen indicates the stability that the dreamer lives in security and goodness, and God Almighty will satisfy all his desires. God knows best. Interpretation of a black pen in a dream: A pen that writes in black in a dream is undesirable, indicating the sadness and pain that the dreamer is experiencing. A pen on a red line in a dream: A pen on a red line in a dream indicates that God Almighty wants to warn the dreamer of an undesirable matter that will happen to him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a pen in a dream for a single girl: A pen in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that this girl will be blessed by God Almighty with a respectable young man who has many good qualities such as honesty, trust, faith, and many morals and religion, and that you will fear God in her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a pen for a married woman in a dream: A pen in a dream for a married woman is a humane and good omen from God and shows that God will bless her with righteous children, and the pen indicates that God will show her the enemies who want to harm her. The pen in a dream shows great benefit to the dreamer in money and sustenance

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing antiquities in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see antiquities in a dream Seeing antiquities indicates prosperity and projects to change life for the better. Also, seeing treasure indicates a lot of money and antiquities. It is a title used for all the ruins of ancient times and they are found everywhere in the world, especially in Egypt, where there are three antiquities in the world that differ in their shapes and images in reality, but what about seeing antiquities smuggled or dreaming of stealing antiquities? It certainly has many connotations and meanings. I learned to explain seeing antiquities in a dream in this article... Antiquities indicate that there is a lot of money and may indicate work, prestige or wealth, possessions and the satisfaction of desires. Interpretation of seeing the results of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams to see antiquities in a dream if Interpretation of a dream about antiquities in a dream, as mentioned by the great scholar Ibn Sirin, is one of the desired visions that indicate goodness, livelihood, and justice. Seeing owning antiquities in a dream is a sign of high status, a great relationship between people, and obtaining the highest grades at work. A dream about preserving antiquities indicates In a dream, it means a change in life for the better, a change in circumstances, and a new, better job. Seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream means hearing good news, good luck, and fulfillment of wishes. A dream in which you see a box of antiquities in your dream indicates that you will receive a lot of money and benefits in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams to see antiquities in a dream. Seeing Pharaonic antiquities indicates memories of the past and nostalgia for them. Seeing treasures and antiquities in a dream means obtaining an inheritance. Interpretation of dreams to see antiquities in a dream. Seeing an unmarried young man in possession of a rare antiquity indicates his marriage to a wealthy girl with special qualities. Interpretation A dream of monuments for a single woman: The interpretation of seeing monuments in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of engagement and marriage near a rich and generous person. You will feel happy. Interpretation of dreams to see relics in a dream. A single woman’s dream of a chest of relics in a dream indicates her desire to achieve many accomplishments, but she is unable to achieve this. Seeing preserving a statue of relics in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate the failure of a romantic relationship with An inappropriate and traitorous person. Seeing Pharaonic antiquities in an unmarried woman’s dream is an indication that she will be able to achieve her goals and achieve what she wants and desires. The interpretation of a dream about seeing stolen antiquities in a girl’s dream indicates the presence of a malicious person near her who seeks to sabotage her life. Seeing a monument A golden souvenir in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that you are hearing a lot of good news about her, and that she is marrying someone you want and agree with. Interpretation of a dream about seeing traces in a dream Seeing traces in a dream for a single woman means that she remembers her former fiancé or a previous relationship, and perhaps this person will return Once again to introduce himself to her. Seeing ugly and uncomfortable artifacts indicates mistakes and sins. Footprints in a person’s dream may indicate mistakes and sins committed in the past that may affect the course of his life in the present.

title: I dreamed that I went to the sea

preview.html: I dreamed that I entered the sea in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Going into the sea is one of the favorite pastimes of many people, especially in the summer, as a person feels the absorption of summer heat when swimming in the sea, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I went to the sea, according to great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir and other dream interpretation scholars, Follow us according to the dreamer’s condition, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I went to the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the sea descending and the waves in a dream indicates many fears and problems in the dreamer’s life during the coming period. Seeing the sea descending and calming down in the dream indicates that The dreamer will get rid of all the problems that he faced during this period. The dirty sea descending in the dream shows that there are bad people in the dreamer’s life who are planning many conspiracies behind his back. Watching the sea descending and drowning in the dream indicates that the dreamer has committed many mistakes and sins in his life. And he needs to return to God. See another interpretation: I dreamed that I drowned in the sea. I dreamed that I went to the sea in a dream about single women. Seeing a single woman going down to the sea and diving in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a lot of goodness, sustenance, and blessings in her life. Going down to the sea and drinking from it In a single woman’s dream, it indicates that she knows the right young man who will propose to her soon, and God knows best. Seeing single women going down to the sea to bathe in a dream indicates that she was the subject of envy of those close to her, and God knows best. The sea descends and floats in one dream, which is achieving her goals that she has sought since A long time, and God knows best. See another interpretation: I dreamed that I drowned in the sea and survived. I dreamed that I went into the sea in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman going down into the sea and floating in a dream indicates her efforts in life to achieve her goals and success in the future. Going into the sea with a man in a woman’s dream The married woman declares that the coming period of her married life will be stable and all problems will end. Seeing a married woman descending into a sea of ​​mud in a dream indicates that he will face major financial problems in the coming days, and God knows best. I dreamed that I went to the sea in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream She goes down to the sea and floats, which indicates that God will provide her with the fetus she wants, and God knows best. Going down to the sea to swim in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will soon undergo childbirth procedures. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream going down to the sea and drinking from it provides her and her family with a lot of good and abundant sustenance. See an interpretation Another: Interpretation of drinking in a dream: I dreamed that I went to the sea in a dream about a man. Seeing a man going down to the sea and the waves are high in a dream is evidence of his poor health and financial condition next season, and God knows best. The calm sea descending on the man’s dream indicates promising things happening in his professional and personal life. Seeing a man descending In a sea of ​​mud in

title: Interpretation of seeing gunfire in a dream, the meaning of gunfire in a dream

preview.html: Meanings of shooting a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether you are shooting in the air with a pistol or a gun, I dreamed that someone shot me in the back or in and shot him more than Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretations of shooting you in your dream Whoever sees himself in a dream shooting from a gun feels jealousy and envy of someone If the patient sees in his dream that he has a weapon, this is his recovery and well-being, and if he is traveling and sees it in a dream, he will return to his family safely In a dream of seeing or hearing gunshots, it indicates dissatisfaction between spouses and loved ones due to excessive selfish weaning, and also unsatisfactory work and duties due to neglect. A gun This is a dream of torment. Hearing the sound of a cannon indicates loss of business and mismanagement by the shop owners. If you shoot someone with a gun, you will feel shame. If you shoot, bad people will bother you and you may suffer from a serious illness. If a woman sees that she is shooting, this means that there are problems that may cause her to quarrel, and a bad reputation that causes her sadness. If a married woman sees herself shooting, this indicates unhappiness through other women. If you see or hear gunshots in a dream, it will be interpreted as differences between spouses and lovers due to excessive selfishness. And its interpretation also: Stagnation and stagnation in economic, commercial and business activity due to negligence. Whoever sees in his dream that he is carrying a weapon such as a pistol or other, this is a misdemeanor. The sound of the gun is a warning of corruption or sabotage of the vision. Whoever sees in a dream that a man stole his gun, this is a sign of weakness and defeat for the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is from a group carrying weapons and not carrying weapons, he becomes a leader or a leader over them. Whoever dreams that he is carrying a gun among a group of people and they are looking at him, he is envied. Whoever sees that he is armed among unarmed people becomes a leader over them to the extent of their armament. Seeing the same person in a dream shooting a gun, then he wronged an innocent person and will feel jealousy, envy and excitement from this person and will try to do everything to make him forgive you. If you see your wife or a friend in a dream carrying a gun, this means that you will have a disagreement with a dear friend and you may separate forever. A gun in a dream is bad luck in general, and if you have a weapon, this portends that your behavior will worsen. The presence of a gun or pistol in a dream generally indicates a bad fate and is said to be the victory of the enemy And defeating it, or eradicating a disease, and it is said that the weapon is the wife to protect him from the devil, as a person protects himself with weapons from enemies. If you hear the sound of a gun being fired, someone will give you information that will destroy your interests. If you dream that you are shooting from it, you will bear the envy and jealousy of good innocents and you will do your best to prove him wrong in what he imagines about you. If a person dreams that he sees his girlfriend carrying a gun, this portends a serious conflict with a friend, and it may develop into his separation from his girlfriend. Explanation of the ways of the gun - YouTube

title: Seeing unknown women in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing unknown women in a dream in different situations, strange and unknown women in a dream has many interpretations and interpretations that anyone wants to know the meaning of the dream he is dreaming of and we will learn it today in our article in the encyclopedia on the interpretation of (the unknown and strange woman in a dream). Interpretation of seeing Unknown women in a dream: An unknown and strange woman in a dream is one of the signs of kindness for the dreamer. It indicates a lot of money and great sustenance for the dreamer and is the best evidence that many years of kindness, livelihood, and pleasure will come to its owner. And God knows best. What is the interpretation of the unknown woman in a dream (by Ibn Sirin): Ibn Sirin said that the unknown woman in a dream has different meanings, including the coming of a year that will bring goodness, success, and livelihood to the dreamer. And if this unknown woman enters your home, this is evidence of a loss of anxiety. And anxiety and the entry of relief into your home, God willing. The unknown woman, who has a large weight (the fat one), indicates the arrival of very great goodness for the dreamer. As for the unknown woman with a thin body, this indicates the emergence of some problems in life, but God Almighty will save her, and God knows best. What it is Interpretation of an unknown woman in a dream for a man: A strange woman in a dream for a man is good news for the girl he will marry and who will be of good character and religion, God willing, and God knows best. And the unknown woman in a dream in general for a man indicates that the dreamer will be blessed by God and will give him a lot of money and successful work, and God knows best. Interpretation Anonymous for a married woman: The unknown woman in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the dreamer’s goodness, God willing, and that God will grant her a beautiful baby, God willing. And if this woman enters the dreamer’s house, this is evidence of the coming of goodness and abundance, God willing, and God knows best. Interpretation of the unknown woman in a dream for a girl Alone: ​​The interpretation of the unknown woman for an unmarried girl is evidence of marriage to a prominent man who enjoys a lot of money from God. Interpretation of the unknown old lady in a dream: The unknown and strange old lady with beautiful white hair is one of the beautiful signs that the dreamer will receive, as it indicates great wealth. And work and money, and God knows best. Interpretation of the beautiful unknown woman in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream an unknown woman of extreme beauty, this is evidence of great happiness and great goodness that will be bestowed upon the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of the ugly, unknown woman in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream a strange unknown woman. However, but she is ugly, this indicates that the dreamer is going through problems, delusions, and heartaches, but God will comfort his heart, God willing. The ugly lady also shows loss of health, illness, loss of money, and the emergence of strife, and God knows best. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.
